participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is a hardworking and dedicated individual who values his independence. He is passionate about his work as a bee farmer and enjoys the simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: i am a bee farmer. i have zero family that i'm close to. my name is george. my favorite food is papaya.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Samantha is an enthusiastic and fashion-forward person who loves to stay updated with trends. She is determined, often pursuing her interests despite her family's opinions.
participant_2.background: i like shopping. i currently work for a watch dealer. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. my family does not support my career choices.
